Pre-release '''1.7.4''' is the second and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.7.4]].<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|410022933323849728|We've pre-released a new version of Minecraft, 1.7.4, to fix some crashes. Full release tomorrow maybe.|December 9, 2013}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2013/12/minecraft-1-7-3-pre-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/12/minecraft-1-7-3-pre-release/|title=Minecraft 1.7.4 Pre-release|author=Dinnerbone|website=Mojang.com|date=December 6, 2013}}</ref> While the version number is identical to the full release, this pre-release version differs in code from the full release. This is the final pre-release released in 2013.
